thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens lower after report China may slow U.S. bond buys

author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens lower after report China may slow U.S. bond buys
text:
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Wall Streetâ€™s main indexes opened lower on Wednesday, spooked by a report that China is considering slowing or halting purchases of U.S. government debt.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average fell 65.71 points, or 0.26 percent, to 25,320.09. The S&P 500 lost 8.51 points, or 0.309309 percent, to 2,742.78. The Nasdaq Composite dropped 33.98 points, or 0.47 percent, to 7,129.60.
Reporting by Sruthi Shankar in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
